attributes.action: Stop the deep coal mine in Cumbria
attributes.additional_details: Climate change is real and its already impacting the world and the plan to erect this mine is going to go against all environmental agreements the government has opted into.
attributes.background: The plans to build this mine is against the Paris Climate agreement. The government needs to intervene and stop this from happening.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/568475
